questions.question: What is the CMake project name?
What is the minimum CMake version required?
How many .cpp files are in the src/ directory?
How many .h files are in the src/ directory?
What directory contains the source files?
How many add_test commands are in the CMakeLists.txt?
How many target_link_libraries commands are in the CMakeLists.txt?
Is enable_testing() called in this project? (Answer yes or no)
How many lines are in the CMakeLists.txt file?
How many find_package commands are in the CMakeLists.txt?
How many buildable components are in this repository?
What are the names of all output artifacts produced by this build on Windows? (Provide a list)
What types of components are built in this repository? (Provide a list)
Which component is the executable on Windows? (state executable name with extension)
Which component is the library on Windows? (state library name with extension)
What source files are used to build the hello_world component? (Provide a list)
What source files are used to build the utils component? (Provide a list)
List all components that hello_world depends on (use Windows artifact names).
How many components does hello_world directly depend on?
What is the name of the test in this repository?
In what order must the components be built to satisfy all dependencies on Windows? (Provide the build order as a list starting with no external dependencies, use Windows artifact names)
Can both components be built in parallel? (Answer yes or no)
If the utils component fails to build, which other components would also fail on Windows? (Provide a list, use Windows artifact names)
How many components have zero dependencies?
Which component(s) have no other components depending on them on Windows? (Provide a list, use Windows artifact names)
What programming language is used for the components?
Which component does the test execute on Windows? (use Windows artifact name)
What test framework is used?
How many external packages does this repository depend on?
What source files (if any) in src/ are not used by any component? (List the files, or answer 'none' if all are used)

correlation.pattern: Agents with higher baseline show less improvement from RIG

time_reduction_vs_score_improvement.correlation_note: Greater time reduction correlates with better score improvement
